mapper.select: SELECT p.*, CASE when p.author_type = 'US' THEN us.user_name when p.author_type = 'AM' THEN am.admin_name END as 'author' from posts p LEFT join admins am on am.admin_code = p.author_code LEFT join users us on us.user_code = p.author_code;

SELECT p.*, CASE when p.author_type = 'US' THEN us.user_name when p.author_type = 'AM' THEN am.admin_name END as 'author' from posts p LEFT join admins am on am.admin_code = p.author_code LEFT join users us on us.user_code = p.author_code where p.post_type = 'NT';

SELECT p.*, CASE when p.author_type = 'US' THEN us.user_name when p.author_type = 'AM' THEN am.admin_name END as 'author' from posts p LEFT join admins am on am.admin_code = p.author_code LEFT join users us on us.user_code = p.author_code where p.post_type = 'NT' AND p.post_code = #{postCode};

SELECT p.*, CASE when p.author_type = 'US' THEN us.user_name when p.author_type = 'AM' THEN am.admin_name END as 'author' from posts p LEFT join admins am on am.admin_code = p.author_code LEFT join users us on us.user_code = p.author_code where p.post_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%');
